name: popx
description: This template provides a minimal setup to get React working in Vite with HMR and some ESLint rules.

scripts.build: npm run build:client && npm run build:server
scripts.build:client: cd client && npm install && npm run build
scripts.build:server: cd server && npm install && npm run build
scripts.install:all: npm install && npm install --prefix client && npm install --prefix server
